name: Luis PAGAN, Appellant v. PENNA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Hon. Kathleen Kane Attorney General Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Pagan v. Penna. Board of Probation

parties: Luis PAGAN, Appellant v. PENNA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Hon. Kathleen Kane Attorney General Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James Patrick Barker, PA Office of Attorney General, Harrisburg, for Kathleen Kane.
Jason Anthony Lambrino, PA Office of Chief Counsel, Harrisburg, for Penna. Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
113 A.3d 1229
Luis PAGAN, Appellant v. PENNA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Hon. Kathleen Kane Attorney General Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 27, 2015.
Luis Pagan, pro se.

Jason Anthony Lambrino, PA Office of Chief Counsel, Harrisburg, for Penna. Board of Probation and Parole.
